resources.string: Stick the X microchip on your sim card to get data when you travel.
Refer friends to get free data for every friend who joins!
With our 580 telco partners in the world
Apply the X-Microchip just once. No more wasting time buying a new SIM every time you travel
Switch between your local SIM and the Flexiroam X network easily
Roam in over 100 countries anytime anywhere with Flexiroam X
Please begin by entering your card number above and follow the steps. We will never charge you without your permission.

Avoid huge roaming fees when you\'re overseas.
Flexiroam is the latest data roaming solution for you to get data when you travel.
Order an X Starter Pack with a free X microchip to start roaming in over 100 countries.
Have a promo code?\nEnter the code below.
Have a promo code?\nEnter the code below.
Switch to Flexiroam X before doing this step!
Go to your phone Settings > Mobile Networks / Cellular Networks > Access Point Names
Type in flexiroam for Name and APN > Save
Select flexiroam APN to turn it on
Please check our coverage to find our partner network in your destination.
* Approximate data usage examples\nshown above, your actual usage may differ.
Note: We do not ship to P.O. Boxes.\nEnter address in English.
How to attach the microchip to your SIM card

Do you have good signal strength?
Ensure that you have good signal strength.
Staying indoors or underground quite often disrupts your mobile network signal.
Alternatively, you can reach to our support team via Whatsapp
Are you in a supported country?
Please check our coverage to find our supported countries.
First, check if you have switched to Flexiroam X in the SIM toolkit.
Click to go to SIM toolkit
If the button above does not work, find the SIM toolkit in your app drawer.
Tap on FLEXIROAM X-KIT > Switch SIM > Flexiroam X
Restart your phone to apply the changes.
Turn off Wi-Fi to access data via Flexiroam X mobile data instead of Wi-Fi.
We won\'t be able to indicate if you\'re connected to our networks if your Wi-Fi is turned on and connected.
If you\'re unable to connect to a network,\nplease go through the checklist below:
Turned on Mobile Data and Data Roaming?
Do you have good signal strength?
Are you in a supported country?
Turned on Mobile Data and Data Roaming?
Switch to Flexiroam X before doing this step!"
Go to your phone Settings > Mobile Networks / Cellular Networks
Turn on Mobile Data and turn on Data Roaming
Please allow Facebook permissions\nto unlock free data.

and click the link in the email to login.

Please update to the latest version of Flexiroam X.

to leave this page?

Your details will not be saved.

A copy of this invoice has been sent to your email.
To access and use Flexiroam X data in over 100 countries, you\'ll need to get a Starter Pack which contains the X microchip.
Then just attach the X microchip onto your existing SIM card to start roaming.
If you proceed, the auto-renewal of your Flexiroam X data plan will be stopped.\n\nYou will lose remaining data upon expiry of the plan.

Currently unable to retrieve call rate information for selected country.
Please make sure that you have selected a country and input a valid phone number to call.
You currently have no call history.\nSwipe down to refresh.
How can I use my free data?
Note: You\'re not reachable on your home SIM while switched to Flexiroam X.
